kDesc
An indigo-coloured school uniform skirt that just barely meets school regulations about length.\nYouthness:★★★\nDefensive Strength:★[#Legal]
Jupe scolaire indigo au dessus du genou, à la limite du réglementaire.\nJeunesse : ★★★\nDéfense : ★[#Legal]
Indigoblauer Schuluniformsrock, dessen Saumabstand von den Knien gerade noch die Schulregularien erfüllt.\nJugendlichkeitslevel: ★★★\nVerteidigung: ★[#Legal]
Una gonna blu per studentesse che arriva sopra il ginocchio. Rientra per poco nei limiti concessi dalle scuole.\nLivello giovinezza: ★★★\nDifesa: ★[#Legal]
Falda azul oscuro por encima de la rodilla que roza los límites del reglamento de la escuela.\nNivel de juventud: ★★★\nDefensa: ★[#Legal]
校則スレスレの膝上丈に調整された、藍色の学生スカート。\n青春度 ：★★★\n防御力 ：★[#Legal]
교칙에 아슬아슬하게 무릎 위로 줄인 남색의 교복 스커트. \n청춘도 ：★★★\n방어력 ：★[#Legal]
An indigo-colored school uniform skirt that just barely meets school regulations about length.\nYouthness:★★★\nDefensive Strength:★[#Legal]
